mapper.select: SELECT seq_no, notice_target, notice_title, regist_date, status FROM notice_his WHERE status != 9 ORDER BY seq_no ASC

SELECT seq_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_target, notice_st_date, notice_end_date, status, regist_id, regist_date, last_chg_id, last_chg_date, expire_id, expire_date FROM notice_his WHERE seq_no = #{seq_no} AND status != 9
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_his ( notice_title, notice_content, notice_target, notice_st_date, notice_end_date, status, regist_id, regist_date, last_chg_id, last_chg_date, expire_id, expire_date ) VALUES ( #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_target}, #{notice_st_date}, #{notice_end_date}, #{status}, #{regist_id}, TO_DATE(#{regist_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{last_chg_id}, TO_DATE(#{last_chg_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{expire_id}, TO_DATE(#{expire_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_his SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content}, notice_target = #{notice_target}, notice_st_date = #{notice_st_date}, notice_end_date = #{notice_end_date}, status = #{status}, regist_id = #{regist_id}, regist_date = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), last_chg_id = #{last_chg_id}, last_chg_date = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), expire_id = #{expire_id}, expire_date = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE seq_no = #{seq_no}
